props.name: updated_since
props.description: Only return clients that have been updated since the given date and time.

reports-uninvoiced.description: Uninvoiced hours and expenses for all billable projects

props.name: from
props.description: Only report on time entries and expenses with a spent_date on or after the given date. (YYYY-MM-DD)

props.name: to
props.description: Only report on time entries and expenses with a spent_date on or before the given date. (YYYY-MM-DD)

props.name: include_fixed_fee
props.description: Whether or not to include fixed-fee projects in the response. (Default: true)
